A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: -Spoiler-\n\n I really loved the film. The dynamic between Ben Solo and Rey is fantastic. I am also very excited for the next episode and the romantic tension between Rey and Ben. Rose was fantastic too\, Finn and Poe also did a very good job. I don´t actually know why so many people hate the movie. They hated TFA because it was like a new hope but they also hate this movie because its too different. They also say Finn´s an Rose´s misson was useless\, but what did you expect? Not everything is going to end well for the \"good\" guys. Thats normal. Not every mission can be succesful\, that´s what Rian showed us\, the gloom of war\, and he did it perfectly!
